name: Escape from the woods
description:
An FPS where you have to get to the cabin that is inside the forest.
In this forest live monsters that chase you and explode.
You use a gun to defend yourself from these monsters and get to the cabin.

Controls: Move WASD, Shoot right click, Reload R, Pause Esc.

This is a project made by Sergi Sicilia, Joel Viladiu, Alex Gomez and Joel Tallarda.
